group_1.narration: The Magical Girls of Yukuni City are being cornered,@one by one transforming into Witches against their will.@This leads to a vicious cycle where those afflicted by@the Witches' curses seek revenge against Magical Girls.

The Eradication Faction led by Kuroda targets@even the families of Magical Girls. However, to@avoid exposing their actions as public knowledge,@they only hunt down those of us with debts to pay.@Consequently, many Magical Girls have vanished.

Unable to stand idly by, the three of us@decided to shoulder the negative emotions@directed towards Magical Girls after the Festival,@aiming to prevent harm to other Magical Girls@and minimize the damage done to Yukuni City.
However, we never imagined the situation@to become this brutal...

group_1.textLeft: [se:3001_chara_damage][chara:103400:effect_shake][flashEffect:flashRed2]Ugh...!

group_1.textRight: ...Magical Girls really do heal quickly, huh?
As long as you don't break the soul vessel called@the Soul Gem,
you will remain alive.

group_1.textLeft: *Pant*...*Pant*...

group_1.textRight: We've pushed you this far, so get the hell out@of town already.
We all know there won't be peace until all@Magical Girls are gotten rid of,
but we're sayin' now that we'd settle with@just you three leaving.
So if anything, you Magical Girls should be@thanking us, right?

group_1.textLeft: And from now on, even if somethin' happens,
we're only gonna blame the Magical Girls@who caused it.
We won't blame indiscriminately, so just get away@from here already.

group_1.textRight: You're wasting your breath.@These girls aren't going to leave that easily.
The three of them are acting as a shield to protect@other Magical Girls from being targeted.

group_1.textLeft: Then, let's crush that shield to set an example.
That way, the other girls might get scared of@being the next target,
and they might leave town...
If that happens, it'll be a plus for us, right?

group_1.textRight: If that's the case, we're still being too lenient.
Lemme have a go at her.
I'm gonna have my payback for that humiliation@I suffered last time.

group_1.textLeft: Don't bring in petty personal grudges.
Our goal, at heart, is to bring peace to the town.
Peace, huh...

group_1.textRight: Hey, Miura.@I'll give you one last chance to choose.
Stay here and become an example for the others,@or get out of town and live a comfortable life...

group_1.textLeft: ...If we leave, other Magical Girls will become@the next targets...

group_1.textRight: If something happens, some incident or accident,@there's a chance.
You've revealed your true nature in front of us,@after all...

group_1.textLeft: Magical Girls don't kill people...

group_1.textRight: Even if you say so, as long as there's uncertainty,@we have no choice but to drive you away.

group_1.textLeft: I cannot leave.
So please take your anger and your grief all@out on me.

group_1.textRight: ...That's still not enough to make you go away, huh.

group_1.textLeft: Hey you, with all your talk about losing,
your friend in the hospital died, didn't he?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: If beating her up makes you happy, then so be it.
Miura seems to want that.

group_1.textRight: Then I'll do it without hesitation.
[flashEffect:flashWhite1]Get a taste of the dead's pain, you bastard!!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed1][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:103400:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Ugh...!

group_1.textRight: I wonder if there was a way we could've@avoided all this.

group_1.textLeft: We never should have...spread the word about...@Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: That's right...
Maybe if we never knew, we would've just@cursed our own misfortune...
[flashEffect:flashWhite1]Don't you dare fuckin' ignore me!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed1][se:3001_chara_damage][bgEffect:shakeSmall][chara:103400:effect_shake]Gah...

group_1.narration: This is fine.@Because all of this is a sin of our own making,@we have no choice but to live with our current situation.

[flashEffect:flashRed1][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:103400:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeSmall]No matter how violent their methods may be,@as long as we continue to endure, other@Magical Girls will be spared.
If the other girls see us as examples and@leave town, then that's fine by me,@as long as they are still alive.
And in time, I'm sure Kuroda and his friends will come@to know the lingering emptiness left behind by violence,@and their anger will gradually fade away.

[flashEffect:flashRed1][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:103400:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeSmall]If that doesn't work, I will sever ties with mankind@and quietly leave this town to live in the mountains...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]You gotta give her a good slap like this.

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:103400:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Urgh...!

group_1.narration: No, I'm losing consciousness...@I guess I'd better block out the pain for now...
Ah, to be able to erase pain at will...@It truly brings home the fact that@I'm not human after all...
